revised_title: John Tradescant and the Early Cultivation of Botany in England
tldr: The author discusses the early cultivation of botany in England, focusing on John Tradescant's significant contributions to the field. Tradescant, a prominent botanist and natural historian, introduced numerous plants to England and maintained a famous garden that showcased his extensive collection. His work played a crucial role in the revival of botany in Europe during the 16th century.
